description: "Hand-drawn and coloured plan of the fortifications at Batavia (Jakarta, Java) including the castle, city walls, and moat and canal system. An inset map features four more of the city’s fortifications. This is a copy of an original 1788 map."
title: "Plattegrondtekening der vestingwerken van de stad en 't kasteel Batavia, benevens daar volgende batteryen"
